sources.title: Goldilocks and the Jivin' Bears (1944)
sources.description: The stories of "Goldilocks" and "Little Red Riding Hood" collide with the world of jazz, resulting in three jiving bears and a jitterbugging Big Bad Wolf.   Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/goldilocks-and-the-jivin-bears-1944/

metadata.Plot: An all-black cast, featuring the Three Bears as a jazz combo, combines the stories of "Goldilocks and the Three Bears" and "Little Red Riding Hood."
metadata.Actors: Sara Berner, Mel Blanc, Billy Mitchell
